meaningMnemonic: To <kanji>pluck</kanji> off someone's mask and <kanji>departure</kanji> it off somewhere away from their face, that is <vocabulary>to unmask</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to expose</vocabulary> someone.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
